hints.content:
Each digit of ${8{,}700}$ is one place to the left of the same digit in the number ${870}$.

Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-:
$$ | $\greenD8$ | $\blueD7$  | $\purpleC0$ 
$\greenD8$ | $\blueD7$ | $\purpleC0$  | $\maroonD0$

Moving each digit to the left means multiplying by $10$: 
  
${870}\times 10={8{,}700}$

question.content:
**Fill in the blank so the sentence accurately explains the relationship between $8{,}700$ and $870$.**

$8{,}700$ is [[â˜ƒ dropdown 2]] $870$.
